snippet.title: God of War – Story Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/god-of-war/?emcid=or-1s-412983/

From Santa Monica Studio and creative director Cory Barlog comes a new beginning for one of gaming’s most recognizable icons. Living as a man outside the shadow of the gods, Kratos must adapt to unfamiliar lands, unexpected threats, and a second chance at being a father. Together with his son Atreus, the pair will venture into the brutal Norse wilds and fight to fulfill a deeply personal quest.

Available April 20, 2018

Visit the official site: http://godofwar.com
Follow on Twitter: http://twitter.com/sonysantamonica
Engage on Facebook: http://facebook.com/godofwar 
Our Best Fan Art: http://instagram.com/santamonicastudio 

©2018 Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC. God of War is a trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC.
